                              long projectId,
                              @Nullable
                              String target)
                                throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: FileExporter
        Exports a project output file.
        Specified by:
        exportProjectOutputFile in interface FileExporter
        Parameters:
        userId - the userId
        projectId - the project id belonging to the userId
        target - the output target platform, or null
        Returns:
        RawFile with the name and content of the exported file

      • exportProjectSourceZip

        public ProjectSourceZip exportProjectSourceZip(String userId,
                                      long projectId,
                                      boolean includeProjectHistory,
                                      boolean includeAndroidKeystore,
                                      @Nullable
                                      String zipName)
                                        throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: FileExporter
        Exports the project source files as a zip.
        Specified by:
        exportProjectSourceZip in interface FileExporter
        Parameters:
        userId - the userId
        projectId - the project id belonging to the userId
        includeProjectHistory - indicates whether to include a file containing the project's history in the zip
        includeAndroidKeystore - indicates whether to include the user's android.keystore file
        zipName - the desired name for the zip, or null for a name to be generated
        Returns:
        the zip file, which includes a count of the number of zipped files and (indirectly) the name of the file and its contents
        Throws:
        IOException - if files cannot be written

      • exportAllProjectsSourceZip

        public ProjectSourceZip exportAllProjectsSourceZip(String userId,
                                          String zipName)
                                            throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: FileExporter
        Exports all of the user's projects' source files as a zip of zips.
        Specified by:
        exportAllProjectsSourceZip in interface FileExporter
        Parameters:
        userId - the userId
        zipName - the desired name for the zip
        Returns:
        the name, contents, and number of files in the zip
        Throws:
        IOException - if files cannot be written
